name: Two Flowers....Handcrafted fine silver
description:
This one of a kind two flowers pendant is completely handcrafted from precious metal clay from beginning to end. The finished product is 99.9% fine silver. I molded, fired, burnished, patinaed and polished it. 

The patina finish gave the pendant an aged look with shades of gray. I polished it to bring out the silver shine. The sterling silver chain necklace has been oxidized and is 17.5 inches long. 

The pendant measures just about an inch in diameter.

You can learn more about precious metal clay by visitng www.pmcguild.com.

I am happy to make custom orders with pmc. If you have an idea of a symbol, shape or anything that you would like to be made into fine silver, please let me know. I will do my best to create something one of a kind for you. 

Thank you!!

categories.name: F i n e S i l v e r

name: Weaving Waves....Handcrafted Bronze Necklace
description:
This unique pendant is completely handcrafted from bronze clay. I molded, fired, burnished and patinaed it. The finished product is solid bronze.   The metal used is recycled! 

The patina finish gave the pendant an aged look. I polished the high points to make it shine. The sterling silver chain necklace has been given colorful patina look with shades of reds, blues and gold.

The pendant is a little larger than 3/4 inch in diameter.

I am happy to make custom orders with bronze or pmc. If you have an idea of a symbol, shape or anything that you would like to be made into bronze or fine silver, please let me know. I will do my best to create something one of a kind for you. 

Thank you!!

categories.name: B r o n z e

name: Ornate Swirls....Handcrafted Bronze Necklace
description:
I found this pendant design from a drawer pull that I made a mold of. I found it so unique and pretty.

The pendant is completely handcrafted from bronze clay. I molded, fired, burnished and patinaed it. The finished product is solid bronze. A huge plus is that the metal used is recycled. 

The patina finish gave the pendant an aged look. I polished the high points to make it shine. The gunmetal chain necklace measures 17 1/2 inches long.

The pendant is 1 1/4 inches in diameter.

I am happy to make custom orders with bronze or pmc. If you have an idea of a symbol, shape or anything that you would like to be made into copper or fine silver, please let me know. I will do my best to create something one of a kind for you. 

Thank you!!
